name: Haunted Hallmarks
description:
Microgame submission for the 2022 UCSC GDA Microgame Jam!

Made by Lia Cui, Avery Knowlton, Seren Becker, and Katrina VanArsdale

You're a little piff dude trying to make a spooky halloween card in 20 seconds!

use the arrow keys to move and space bar to interact
